description:
This is a free course designed to provide you with the foundation tools of creating a well designed YouTube Channel!

  • How to utilize features within YouTube for Business Promotion
  • How to create ways for someone to discover your Business using YouTube
  • You'll receive step-by-step "how to's" for setting up your YouTube channel
  • This course will provide you with a solid foundation to be found a little better on Youtube
  • Once these features are set up, you'll be able to easily upload videos and implement calls to action.

Take this course and you'll have an optimized YouTube channel that will net you better results as you continue adding video content.
title: How To Set Up Your YouTube Channel For Business
